name: @jsquash/imagequant
description: Wasm image quantizer using libimagequant. A port from Squoosh.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:codec && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.worker.json && cp -r codec package.json README.md LICENSE.codec.md .npmignore ../../LICENSE dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: [[ "$PWD" == *'/dist' ]] && exit 0 || (echo 'Please run npm publish from the dist directory' && exit 1)
